description.value:
Sharp metal jaws wind tightly into the pressure plate mechanism of this snare. When triggered, the jaws clamp shut and spin, damaging limbs in the process. The snare deals @Damage[10d8[piercing]] damage to the first creature to enter the square; that creature must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:34|showDC:all] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] until the end of its next turn.

Failure The creature takes full damage plus @Damage[2d6[bleed]], and it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage plus @Damage[4d6[bleed]], and it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} for 1 minute.
